verses.verse: <S%H2896>Behold<s%>, how good and how <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> it is for <S%H251>brothers<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in <S%H3162>unity<s%>!

It is like the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>ointment<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%>, that ran <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H2206>beard<s%>, even <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H2206>beard<s%>: that went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6310>skirts<s%> of his <S%H4060>garments<s%>;

As the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, and as the dew that <S%H3381>descended<s%> upon the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: for there the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, even <S%H2416>life<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
